data.title: Very best frozen yogurt!
data.text: We go here on a regular basis for the best frozen yogurt on Franklin St. and the best value as well. The peanut utter and chocolate combo is my favorite. Many toppings to choose from as well,

data.title: Best Ice Cream in Chapel Hill!
data.text: This is my favorite place to get ice cream (Frozen Yogurt) in Chapel Hill. You have to try it. You won't regret it!

data.title: Delicious!
data.text: Fun vibe. Great value. Excellent flavor and topping choices. Tucked out of the way. It's your typical frozen yogurt and topping place, but with character.

data.title: YUM!
data.text: Fun place to go and cool off on hot summer day or anytime fo the year!  Definitely a college town experience.

data.title: *Nearly* a Chapel Hill Institution
data.text: The yogurt pump is the a back corner establishment - like a dive bar of a yogurt shop. Mostly college students, but if you are not in the college crowd do not let this scare you. I am a bit beyond college age and it's my favorite cheap dessert place on Franklin St. Good yogurt, good service, and *usually* good vibe.

data.title: Fantastic
data.text: Great yogurt! Tons of yogurt shops  have come and gone in Chapel hill but the Yogurt pump has been around along time!

data.title: Yummy YoPo
data.text: Great selection of frozen yoghurt, the staff are really helpful and let you try samples before you pick your selection. A really yummy dessert option at college-friendly prices. There is also seating available which is helpful.

data.title: Love this place!
data.text: This place is soo good. It's frozen yogurt but I am very skeptical about it because it tastes more like regular ice cream than frozen yogurt. You definitely get a good deal because the prices are very low but the taste is delicious. They also have a good variety of toppings.

data.title: Yummy favors
data.text:
They offered at least 10 flavors...the servers pump it rather than th customer filling up and paying by weight,.  Most were non fat and lower calories.  

The entrance is behind a pizza place on the side and just a few buildings away from Ben and Jerry's.

data.title: A Chapel Hill Classic
data.text: Delicious frozen yogurt hidden away in an alley on Franklin. Popular site for undergrads and fro-yo connoisseurs alike.  Great bargain compared to larger chains.

data.title: Yum for everyone
data.text: Charming little place tucked away downtown. Great frozen yogurt, sweet toppings, and nice, quick service. Perfect place for a first date.

data.title: Very good and fast!!
data.text: We visited froyo after dinner out.  The yogurt was delicious and the choice of toppings was fantastic!  The price was very reasonable also!  There was quite a line when we arrived but it moved very quickly and the serving size was great.

data.title: A Chapel Hill Institution
data.text: As a UNC tradition we felt the need to try this as soon as we arrived on campus, and it really was delicious - the froyo is so creamy it's almost like frozen custard in texture, and although it wasn't self service which is always preferable for frozen yogurt it is something that cannot be missed when passing through town.

data.title: Downtown Frozen Yogurt in Chapel Hill
data.text: Good frozen yorgut place in downtown Chapel Hill. Very popular with UNC students as it is within walking distance to a lot of student housing, so expect a line if your are going anytime after dinner. While the product is good, the physical layout makes it difficult to get in and out quickly. Otherwise I would have rated it higher.

data.title: The best
data.text: I don't know why you would go anywhere else for frozen yogurt.  Rotating flavors that are all very good, both the traditional tart flavors and the more-like-ice-cream flavors like oreo and peanut butter.  Pick your toppings and they are not stingy.  Excellent value.

data.title: Great yogurt, terrible service
data.text: The yogurt here is great and very cheap.  They always have great flavors, and it's just fine.  But the service is AWFUL every single time.  The people who work there seem miserable, and they're never friendly.  The last time I was here the gal working behind the counter just stared blankly at us until we ordered.  No "hello," no "how can I help you?"  Just a silent glare until we spoke.  And the place was empty - I think we were quite literally the first customers of the day.

data.title: Fast, inexpensive froyo
data.text: Flavors change often and are posted on their website. Good place to go for quick, inexpensive frozen yogurt after a meal. I get the kid's size.

data.title: worth the wait!
data.text: Yogurt Pump almost always has a line out the door (especially in warm weather), but trust me on this, it is worth the wait! The yogurt is frozen more firmly, so it is not sloppy and melty as soon as you get it. They will even add toppings to your cone, by creating a hole in the middle for the toppings to go in. The tart vanilla is a classic and really tasty, although the brownie batter is great, too. the only drawback is lack of parking. Skip Sweet Frog and go to Yopo...you'll love it!

data.title: A true Chapel Hill classic!!
data.text:
Well, my days studying at Chapel Hill have been done for a while, but I then realized I had never written about one of my favorite places to get dessert! Trust me, it is well worth it!
I remember first coming to this place and trying out their yogurt. The amazing thing is, it doesn't even taste like yogurt!! Their flavors are exactly as they are listed, without any yogurt-y aftertaste! Don't get me wrong, I love yogurt, but when I order cookies and cream flavor, I would prefer to have more cookie and less yogurt (which they do!!). My personal flavor favorites are Cookies and Cream, Red Velvet, Dulce De Leche, Apple Pie, Chocolate (and so many more but I must be brief). Their menu changes almost daily, so you're never bored with the selection. The staff is friendly and the prices are reasonable. All I can say is, if I am ever back in NC, this place will be one of my first stops!

data.title: Cheap and convenient
data.text: place isn't self served but they give you a lot for super cheap! Place is small but super convenient and quick
